scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "BROWSER=none npm run start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && tsc -p electron -w" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && tsc -p electron && electron --enable-logging ."
scripts.electron:build-mac-dev: npm run build && NOTARIZATION=none electron-builder build --mac --publish always
scripts.electron:build-linux-dev: npm run build && electron-builder build --linux --publish always
scripts.electron:build: npm run build && electron-builder build --mac --linux --publish always
scripts.upload:mac: BUCKET=publish-test && gsutil cp gs://$BUCKET/latest-mac.yml gs://$BUCKET/archive/$(date +%Y-%M-%d-%H%M)-latest-mac.yml && echo Devbook-*.dmg Devbook-*.zip latest-mac.yml | xargs -n 1 -I{} gsutil -h "Cache-Control:no-cache, max-age=0" cp dist/{} gs://$BUCKET
scripts.upload:linux: BUCKET=publish-test && gsutil cp gs://$BUCKET/latest-linux.yml gs://$BUCKET/archive/$(date +%Y-%M-%d-%H%M)-latest-linux.yml && echo Devbook-*.AppImage latest-linux.yml | xargs -n 1 -I{} gsutil -h "Cache-Control:no-cache, max-age=0" cp dist/{} gs://$BUCKET
scripts.upload: npm run upload:mac && npm run upload:linux
scripts.release: rm -rf dist && npm run electron:build && npm run upload
